file.name: main.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 0.0.1
  title: API
paths:
  /:
    post:
      summary: Create
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/create'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
components:
  schemas:
    create:
      type: object
      properties:
        attribute:
          type: string
        direct:
          $ref: "./external.yaml#/common"
        referenced:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "./external.yaml#/common"
